content: Clifford, I have had this article open in my browser for four days now. Despite already reading it from start to finish, I keep coming back to read bits of it again and take notes. You have really helped me clarify my thinking and, on a personal level, your (authentic) approach really resonates with me. You have touched on some of the most classic pain points of early-stage SaaS growth. Please keep writing. I promise I’ll keep reading and I’ll also start sharing stories from our own experience. Thanks again, Omer
